author: pawandhananjay
content: <@425572898787426305> is there any writeup/issue/PR on the engine api versioning discussion that happened in devcon? I missed that session, so not sure how we are thinking of doing versioning around the engine_getPayloadV2 method

author: bridge-bot
content:
<n0ble> i will submit a proposal with the versioning that we came up with on devcon some time next week. but the method shouls be specified as V2 and that's it, method and structure versions remain the same. the proposal is about versioning the protocol
itself, to be more specific it's about adding engine_getCaps method that lists all methods supporthed by an EL client
